name: Work hard, Valkyrie!
description:
※ STORY
By when do we need to fight enemies?
Let's get some money easier!
All you have to do is earning money by hiring valkyries!
Fighting enemies is the hired valkyries' job.
Please, level up to get the enemies work hard without any break.
If you save a lot of money, purchase the neighboring planet.
The proper investment into property brings you another fortune.

※ GAME TIPs
1. Tap on the screen helps you to get golds.
2. If you add more functions, your valkyries would get more golds.
3. If you invest into property, you can continuously get more golds.

※ DEVELOPER'S REMARK
Please, enjoy it and have fun!!
If you have any advice to improve our games, feel free and let us know.
It would be very appreciated.
Also, if there are bugs, let us know. We'll fix it as soon as possible.

E-mail : terryyoung.studio@gmail.com
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/terryyounginfo/
